entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Churchill
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:59 PM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -29.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Churchill Airport 2:00 PM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -29.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 62 %
Wind Chill: -44
Dewpoint: -34.9°C
Wind: WNW 24 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A
